+// Parser should know when a semicolon is missing.
+// https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/87197

+    let x = 100; //~ ERROR: expected `;`
+    println!("{}", x); //~ ERROR: expected `;`
+    let y = 200; //~ ERROR: expected `;`
+    println!("{}", y);
+}
